text: Red Bull will lose 5 or more races
There will be at least one first-time podium-sitter (excluding sprints)
Less than 30 points separating the top 3 drivers at the summer break
Hamilton wins a main race this season
A collision occurs in the pitlane
CashApp RB makes Q3 at least once
All drivers this season stay for next season
At least one race has less than 50% race distance completed before being called off
Ferrari double-DNF in any race (including sprints)
Any team other than Ferrari double-DNF
Albon scores all of Williams' points
The team in the lead at the summer break is NOT the same team that wins the championship
The Formula 2 Driver Champion gets a 2025 F1 seat
Team in 10th place after Race 10 will still be 10th by the end of the season
The winning constructor takes 10 or fewer race wins
A driver gets a race ban for accruing too many license points
Winning constructor wins by a final score margin of 40% or more
Someone crashes at Monaco during the race (please?)
